sen.j: 桂林寺（けいりんじ）とは、京都府舞鶴市にある、丹後国有数の歴史を誇る曹洞宗中本山の寺院。
sen.e: Keirin-ji Temple is the historically prominent Tango Province Chuhonzan (mid-level head temple) of the Soto Sect located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Keirin-ji Temple is the historically prominent Tango Province Chuhonzan (mid-level head temple) of the Soto Sect located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Keirin-ji Temple is the historically prominent Tango Province Chuhonzan (mid-level head temple) of the Soto Sect located in Maizuru City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Its honorific mountain prefix is Ama-no-Kagu-yama.
Its honorific mountain prefix is Ama-no-Kagu-yama.
Its sango (literally, "mountain name"), which is the title prefixed to the name of a Buddhist temple, is Ama-no-Kagu-yama.
Origin and History
Origin and History
Origin and history

sen.j: 1401年：竺翁雄仙（ちくおうゆうせん）和尚が創建。
sen.e: 1401: Founded by Chikuo Yusen Osho.
1401: Founded by Chikuo Yusen Osho.
1401: Founded by Chikuo Yusen Osho.

sen.j: 1600年：関ヶ原の戦いで田辺城 (丹後国)に籠城した細川幽斎のため参戦。
sen.e: 1600: Participated in the Battle of Sekigahara on the side of Yusai HOSOKAWA who was held up in Tanabe Castle (Tango Province).
1600: Participated in the Battle of Sekigahara on the side of Yusai HOSOKAWA who was held up in Tanabe Castle (Tango Province).
1600: Participated in the Battle of Sekigahara on the side of Yusai HOSOKAWA who was held up in Tanabe-jo Castle (Tango Province).

sen.j: その功績に対し仏涅槃図や梵鐘が贈られた。
sen.e: The temple was rewarded by the donation of a painting depicting Buddha's entrance into Nirvana and a bell.
The temple was rewarded by the donation of a painting depicting Buddha's entrance into Nirvana and a bell.
The temple was rewarded by the donation of a painting depicting Buddha's entrance into Nirvana and a bell.
1717: The Sanmon gate was constructed (believed to have been the largest in the city).
1717: The Sanmon gate was constructed (believed to have been the largest in the city).
1717: The Sanmon gate was constructed.
(Believed to have been the largest in the city).
1935: The belfry (Chinese style) was reconstructed.
1935: The belfry (Chinese style) was reconstructed.
1935: The belfry (Chinese style) was reconstructed.

sen.j: 2001年：開創600年記念事業として本堂屋根の葺き替えなどを挙行。
sen.e: 2001: The roof of the main hall was retiled to commemorate the 600th anniversary of the temple's founding.
2001: The roof of the main hall was retiled to commemorate the 600th anniversary of the temple's founding.
2001: The roof of the main hall was retiled to commemorate the 600th anniversary of the temple's founding.

sen.j: 灯籠 - 鎌倉時代後期、国認定重要美術品
sen.e: Garden lantern: Created during the latter part of the Kamakura period and a nationally recognized important work of art

sen.j: 絹本著色 仏涅槃図 - 室町時代、細川忠興の寄進。
sen.e: Color on silk painting of Buddha's entrance into Nirvana: Created during the Muromachi period and donated by Tadaoki HOSOKAWA
